name: Timid Kisses
descrip: Deeply kiss your opponent. Can charm them.
outcome: {attackerName}'s tongue timidly creeps into {targetName}'s mouth, intertwining with {targetHisOrHer} tongue while {attackerHisOrHer} curvy body is pressed tightly against {targetName}!
miss: {attackerName}'s tongue timidly creeps into {targetName}'s mouth, intertwining with {targetHisOrHer} tongue while {attackerHisOrHer} curvy body is pressed tightly against {targetName}, but {targetName} manages to endure {attackerHisOrHer} timid kiss!
statusOutcome: {targetName}'s mind fogs up from the sexual affection! {targetName} is charmed!
